details.text: Global interconnect for 20 global loads and 12 global stores. Reduce number of global loads and stores to simplify global interconnect.
For 20 global loads and 12 global stores.

links.guide: Best Practices Guide : Global Memory Interconnect

details.text: This read-only memory contains information for the host about the system and about each kernel in the system, including kernel names, arguments, and attributes. The system description ROM ensures that the binary image on the FPGA is compatible with the host program.

Additional information.text: Requested size 1048576 bytes, implemented size 1048576 bytes, stall-free, 2 reads and 2 writes.
Reducing accesses to exactly one read and one write for all on-chip memory systems may increase overall system performance.

details.Additional information: Requested size 1048576 bytes, implemented size 1048576 bytes, stall-free, 1 read and 1 write.
Requested size 1048576 bytes, implemented size 1048576 bytes, stall-free, 1 read and 1 write.
